name: Drift-io
description:
If you like .io games, you’re gonna be impressed with this game. To conquer the territory on Drift.io you have to be an amazing pilot. Drift your way through the map to beat other competitors!

Your goal? To conquer as much area as possible. Touch both sides of the screen to drive your car and drift around. Be aware of your trail: if a player goes through it, that’s game over for you. Choose the best strategy to conquer enemy territory and win.

You’re gonna find out that Drift.io is more challenging than other .io games. It’s not enough to just touch the screen and drive around: you have to know how to drift like a pro.

Did you like it? Rate us!

You can also leave a suggestion! :)
